timeline.bodyText: do you actually see from the Spark UI that its not computed twice? I ask because, fileComparisonsRDD is not cached and thus even though this is declared only once, during runtime, Spark will lazily recompute fileComparisonsRDD once for each method that uses it.
timeline.author: vinothchandar

Maybe i missed something.
